Housing: Mom shared that she and the patient's dad is in the process of moving and have to be out of their apartment by tonight. They have not identified a new home, but in the meantime, mom and dad will be staying at a hotel and their other two children will be with family and friend support so that they can maintain schooling. Mom and dad are both looking to move more towards the Pocono area since the housing is more affordable for them.
The only barrier at this moment is securing housing.
Permanency: SW made contact with Josh in the late afternoon and he shared that the patient would be clear to go home with parents come the time of discharge.
